data.message: Hi Facebook, how do I get the verified badge for a news/media page for a UAE-based media company?

replies.message: Hey Maria. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2cuq2bO. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2criUQz. -Kate
